Maven Mojo - Talend Job Builder
Last Published: 2017-06-23  | Version: 6.4.1
Maven Mojo - Talend Job Builder
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports
    • Plugin Documentation

Plugin Documentation

Goals available for this plugin:

Goal Description
ci.builder:generate Use the commandline server mode to generate job sources. When using this Maven plugin, make sure that your commandline is running on the same server.
ci.builder:help Display help information on ci.builder.
Call mvn ci.builder:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
ci.builder:local-generate Use the commandline script mode to generate job sources.

System Requirements

The following specifies the minimum requirements to run this Maven plugin:

Maven 2.0
JDK 1.7
Memory No minimum requirement.
Disk Space No minimum requirement.

Usage

You should specify the version in your project's plugin configuration:

<project>
  ...
  <build>
    <!-- To define the plugin version in your parent POM -->
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.talend</groupId>
          <artifactId>ci.builder</artifactId>
          <version>6.4.1</version>
        </plugin>
        ...
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <!-- To use the plugin goals in your POM or parent POM -->
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.talend</groupId>
        <artifactId>ci.builder</artifactId>
        <version>6.4.1</version>
      </plugin>
      ...
    </plugins>
  </build>
  ...
</project>

For more information, see "Guide to Configuring Plug-ins"
